================
Project Overview
================

Our client (Manufacturer A) is a leading Food & Beverage manufacturer. Client wants to understand the growth patterns of consumer preferences (themes) and evaluate positioning of their brand across different themes. Client also wants to know the sales drivers of their products

Objective
========
Need to understand consumer preference and emerging themes
Analyze our client positioning across different themes
Analyze sale drivers for our client products


Approach
========
Understand Overall Market - different themes
Understand Market Share of vendor A - pricing, competitors, sales share
Understand different themes and their phase
    - Growing phase
    - Mature phase
    - Declining phase   
Identify the emerging trend based on growth & market share
Select three themes and indentify the sales drivers

Evaluation
==========
- Model evaluation with hold out data
- Statistically significant variable selected
